snippet.title: Aztec Ride is on mobile!
snippet.description:
Play now! https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.DrimiaInteractive.AztecRide

Keep the roller coaster alive by giving your Aztec community a nice thrill, but be careful not to lose them! If you run low on fuel, just toss some passengers and catch them on their way back. Hail Quetzalcoatl!

New features:

Gameplay
- The game now features procedurally generated levels.
- You fail a level if you lose all of your people, or if you run out of fuel and don't manage to reach the end of the track.
- Added a settings menu.
- There are 3 input methods:
 - Two buttons
 - Throttle
 - Analog stick
- Added tutorial.
- Updated physics behavior.

Graphics
- Updated UI.
- Updated camera behavior.
- New art and animations.
- Added Anti-Aliasing.
